name: codecompass-platform
description: ğŸ§­ Unified development platform: Site analysis, interview prep, and portfolio showcase

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:ui && npm run build:utils && npm run build:database
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:codecompass && npm run build:portfolio && npm run build:interview-prep
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:packages: cd packages/ui && npm test && cd ../utils && npm test
scripts.test:apps: cd apps/codecompass && npm test && cd ../portfolio && npm test && cd ../interview-prep && npm test
scripts.setup:dev: npm install && npm run setup:packages && npm run setup:apps
scripts.setup:packages: cd packages/ui && npm install && cd ../utils && npm install && cd ../database && npm install
scripts.setup:apps: cd apps/codecompass && npm install && cd ../portfolio && npm install && cd ../interview-prep && npm install
